description: Legislation that would permit only married couples to adopt children is condemned by rights groups.
title: Hungary government proposes same-sex adoption ban
title_page: Hungary government proposes same-sex adoption ban - BBC News
maintext: Under the latest proposed amendment, single people could only adopt with special permission from the minister in charge of family affairs. For this reason, the proposal is also being viewed by critics as an attack on single-parent families as well as LGBT people.
